org.mayanjun.mybatisx.dal

Interface ShardingEntityAccessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDAO, BasicEntityAccessHandler, DynamicDAO, GenericEntityAccessHandler

    public interface ShardingEntityAccessor
    ShardingEntityAccessor. Provide api for sharding business.
    Author:
    mayanjun(6/30/16)
